channel.title: Pages on Timo Sarkar
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Timo Sarkar

item.title: About
item.description: About “pragmatica and dogmatica won’t revolutionize the world. uniqueness and inconvenience will.” Who I am My name is Timo Sarkar (at time of writing this page 19 years old). I am a computer science student and currently doing a federal apprenticeship as a systems engineer. In my down-time I am active in three main fields. Quantum mechanics, neurotechnology and DeFi (decentralized finance). I will give you an in-depth overview of my relation to these research-fields in the section “Interests”.

item.title: Site Notice
item.description: Code for this site can be found on: Blog generated with Hugo. This blog’s theme is a derivation of the popular Natrium theme.
